description: These gluten free pancakes are naturally sweetened with honey and blueberries.
name: Honey & Blueberry Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the flour and cinnamon together in a large bowl. Combine the egg, honey, vanilla and milk in a jug and add to the flour mix. Stir well to form a smooth batter. Fold in the blueberries.

Heat the butter in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and add ladlefuls of batter to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form, flip and cook for 1-2 minutes on the other side or until golden brown.
Serve the pancakes stacked with a drizzle of maple syrup on top.
